scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of clerics in a religious setting. On the left, several figures in white robes are gathered around a lectern with an open book. One figure holds a candle. In the center, a blue altar-like structure is adorned with gold trim and topped with two candelabra holding lit candles. To the right, a group of figures in black hooded robes stand solemnly. The floor is a checkered pattern of yellow and red tiles. The background is a rich gold with a repeating diamond pattern, suggesting a sacred or divine space.
